attributes.additional_details: NHS staff are severely overworked for their terrible wage, and the NHS deserve a much better working condition also!
attributes.background: Increase the NHS wage 15-20%. These men and women were the backbone of this country during covid, and we owe absolutely everything to all of them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Increase funding for the NHS
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714146
